articleContent:
To every Rover who's walked this long road with us, thank you for being here.

✦Duration✦
2025-05-23 00:00 (UTC+8) - 2025-06-11 03:59 (server time)

✦Rewards✦
Radiant Tide x10, Anniversary Avatar: Moment of Resonance x1

✦Eligibility✦
Reach Union Level 8.

✦Event Details✦
- Log in during the event period to claim the rewards.
- Rewards for this event will NOT be reissued via in-game mail once the event ends. Please pay close attention to the event time and claim the rewards beforehand.
articleTitle: [Gifts of Grand Celebration] Anniversary Limited-Time Login Event
